0.1.name: wordpress/rapid-twitter-widget
0.1.description:
Display your latest tweets in a WordPress widget without slowing your website.

The Rapid Twitter Widget doesn't apply any styling to your website, giving you complete control over the look.

Tweets and your content are loaded separately to ensure a delayed response from Twitter doesn't slow down your website.

Now compatibile with Version 1.1 of the Twitter API.

App.net users might like the Rapid ADN Widget.
